name: Sci-Fi Shooter
description:
This is a sci-fi shooting game that I made for an assignment. The aim of the game is to kill all the enemies in the area.

Controls:

WASD - move

Mouse Scroll Wheel - Change Weapons

G - Switch between weapons and gadgets

Left Mouse Button - Shoot/Use Gadget

Right Mouse Button - Aim weapon

E - interact

R - reload

Left Shift - Sprint

Enemies:

Drones: These drones will patrol the area and attack you when they see you and return to their patrol if they lose sight of you

Turrets: Static enemies that will shoot when you come into range

Hunters: Fast enemies who will hunt you down and attack with ruthless efficiency

Shoot explosive barrels to damage nearby enemies (or yourself if you're too close)

Use health stations to regain any lost health

Enjoy :)
